author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UK's Official Receiver Says Unable To Find Employment For A Further 97 Carillion Employees
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - UK’S OFFICIAL RECEIVER:
* SAYS BEEN UNABLE TO FIND ONGOING EMPLOYMENT FOR A FURTHER 97 CARILLION EMPLOYEES WHO HAVE BEEN GIVEN NOTICE OF REDUNDANCY
* IN TOTAL, TO DATE 9,946 JOBS HAVE BEEN SAVED AND 1,802 JOBS HAVE BEEN MADE REDUNDANT THROUGH CARILLION LIQUIDATION‍​‍​ Source text ( bit.ly/2IpIu2Z ) Further company coverage:
